\ Title: The first ALMA survey of protoplanetary discs at 3 mm: demographics of grain growth in the Lupus region
\ Authors: Tazzari M., Testi L., Natta A., Williams J.P., Ansdell M., Carpenter J., Facchini S., Guidi G., Hogherheijde M., Manara C.F., Miotello A., van der Marel N.
\ Table: ALMA continuum measurements at 3 mm, inferred dust masses, and 1-3 mm spectral indices.
\ Notes: Columns F3mm_e, Mdust_e, and alpha_e contain the uncertainties on the measurements in columns F3mm, Mdust, and alpha, respectively.
\ Units: Beam_maj, Beam_min, and Beam_PA: degrees
\ Units: rms: microJy/beam
\ Units: F3mm, F3mm_e: mJy
\ Units: Mdust, Mdust_e: M_Earth
